title: Skins
body:
Hello guys

I was wondering is it possible to somehow see all your skins, with some tool or something.. At this point i have no idea how many skins i have and i would like to have some list or something

Thanks in advance

replies.body: At the moment I don't believe we actually have anywhere that would show how many skins your account owns sadly. I personally think this is an awesome idea though!! So I do encourage you to post this over in [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) as well to draw a little more attention to the subject ^_^!
